Package com.mlt.desktop

Class AWT

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.desktop.AWT
public class AWT
extends java.lang.Object
AWT utilities.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  AWT.ComponentProperties
    Tricky class to put a properties map into a component, hidden in a property change listener.

    • setSize

      public static void setSize​(java.awt.Window window, double widthFactor, double heightFactor)
      Set the window applying a width and/or height factor relative to the screen dimension.
      Parameters:
      window - The window.
      widthFactor - The width factor relative to the screen (0 < factor <= 1).
      heightFactor - The height factor relative to the screen (0 < factor <= 1).
